description: Add support to the omnibox to quick launch Google Cloud Platform Console.
name: GCP Shortcuts
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://localhost:3000 'unsafe-eval'; object-src 'self'; connect-src  https://localhost:3000 wss://localhost:3000 https:; style-src 'self' chrome-extension: * 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' https: http: data:; frame-src https: http:; font-src data: https://localhost:3000;
